name: PhilipsHomeAccess
0:
”Alexa, unlock the front door.”
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
”Alexa, show me the doorbell.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Philips Home Access skill and Alexa, you can control Home Lock using Alexa voice commands.
Please register your Philips Home Access lock using the Philips Home Access, which can be downloaded from Apple Apps Store and Google Play Store. You may set a friendly name for your lock in Philips Home Access. Eg front lock, back lock.

Please enable Philips Home Access skill in Alexa, then sign in to the account that you have registered your Home lock with. After that you may control your device using Alexa voice commands to:
- lock/unlock your door and check your lock’s status

Voice command 
- "Alexa, open the door"
- "Alexa, close the door"

-View & hide Video doorbell

Voice command
- ”Alexa, show the front doorbell."
- "Alexa, go home."
- "Alexa, hide the doorbell."

The skill content is in English.
Additional Support
For additional help, please email support@idlespacetech.com
